name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Paul J. O'DONNELL, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Paul J. O’DONNELL, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The issue raised in this appeal is controlled by Commonwealth v. Johnson, 520 Pa. 165, 553 A.2d 897 (1989). The Order of the Superior Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Paul R. Mazzoni, Robert A. Mazzoni, Scranton, James J. Walker, Carbondale, for appellant.
Andrew J. Jarbola, Dist. Atty., James T. Mulligan, Scranton, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
565 A.2d 1143
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Paul J. O’DONNELL, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 24, 1989.
Filed Nov. 17, 1989.
Paul R. Mazzoni, Robert A. Mazzoni, Scranton, James J. Walker, Carbondale, for appellant.
Andrew J. Jarbola, Dist. Atty., James T. Mulligan, Scranton, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
